news.title: India Unveils National AI Strategy for 2026-2030
news.summary: The Indian government has launched a new National AI Strategy to drive AI innovation and adoption across sectors. The plan includes funding for AI research, tax incentives for AI companies, and a focus on using AI to address critical challenges in healthcare, agriculture, and sustainability.

news.title: Infosys Acquires US AI Firm for $1.2 Billion
news.summary: India's second-largest IT services company, Infosys, has announced the acquisition of a leading US-based AI and machine learning firm for $1.2 billion. The move is aimed at strengthening Infosys' AI capabilities and expanding its footprint in the lucrative US market.

news.title: India's AI Startups Raise $500 Million in Q1 2026
news.summary: Indian AI startups have raised a record $500 million in funding during the first quarter of 2026, underscoring the growing investor interest in the country's AI ecosystem. The funding was driven by both domestic and international venture capital firms eager to tap into India's AI talent pool.

news.title: Reliance Launches AI-powered Virtual Assistant for Retail
news.summary: Reliance Industries, India's largest conglomerate, has launched an AI-powered virtual assistant to enhance the customer experience in its vast retail network. The assistant, powered by advanced natural language processing and machine learning, can handle a wide range of customer queries and tasks.

news.title: Sensex Jumps 500 Points, Nifty Above 18,000 on Strong Domestic Cues
news.summary: The Indian stock market opened on a positive note on February 14th, with the Sensex and Nifty indices witnessing a surge. The Sensex jumped over 500 points, while the Nifty crossed the 18,000 mark, driven by strong domestic cues and positive global sentiment.

news.title: Infosys Shares Surge 5% on Strong Q3 Results, Upbeat Outlook
news.summary: Shares of Infosys, India's second-largest IT services company, surged by over 5% on February 14th after the company reported strong third-quarter results and provided an upbeat outlook for the current fiscal year. The results showcased the company's resilience in the face of global economic challenges.

news.title: Indian Rupee Hits Record High Against US Dollar on Robust Inflows
news.summary: The Indian rupee reached a new all-time high against the US dollar on February 13th, driven by robust foreign portfolio inflows and positive domestic sentiment. The surge in the rupee's value is seen as a positive sign for the Indian economy, indicating the country's strong macroeconomic fundamentals.

news.title: Adani Group Stocks Rebound After Weeks of Volatility
news.summary: Shares of Adani Group companies rebounded on February 13th after weeks of volatility following the Hindenburg Research report. The recovery in stock prices was attributed to the group's efforts to address concerns and restore investor confidence, as well as positive market sentiment.

news.title: India Votes: Landmark General Elections Underway
news.summary: India's much-anticipated general elections have begun, with millions casting their ballots across the country. Key issues include the economy, job creation, and national security. Voter turnout is high, reflecting the country's vibrant democracy. The results are expected to shape India's political landscape for the next five years.

news.title: Modi Seeks Reelection as India Kicks Off Crucial Polls
news.summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is seeking a third term as India's leader, with his Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) facing a tough challenge from the opposition Indian National Congress party. Voter sentiment is divided on issues like the economy, jobs, and Modi's Hindu nationalist agenda. The elections are seen as a crucial test for India's democracy.

news.title: India Tech Giants Gear Up for Election Disruptions
news.summary: India's leading tech companies, including Infosys, TCS, and Reliance Jio, are bracing for potential disruptions and outages during the ongoing general elections. Concerns over cyber attacks, misinformation, and infrastructure challenges have prompted these firms to implement robust contingency plans to ensure seamless operations and data security.

news.title: Opposition Candidates Allege Voting Irregularities in Key States
news.summary: Opposition parties in India have reported instances of voting irregularities and technical glitches in several key states, including Uttar Pradesh and Maharashtra. They have alleged that these issues are aimed at influencing the election outcome. The Election Commission has promised to investigate the complaints and ensure a free and fair democratic process.
